name: Kriterion
description: Filmtheater Kriterion, officieel Vereniging Onderlinge Studentensteun Kriterion (V.O.S.S. Kriterion), is een door studenten geëxploiteerde bioscoop en studentenvereniging aan de Roetersstraat 170 in Amsterdam. Het is voortgekomen uit het studentenverzet tijdens de Tweede Wereldoorlog.

name: Melodium
description: Historic concert venue established in 1923, known for classical music performances and contemporary experimental concerts.

name: Theater Nova
description: Modern theater space showcasing experimental performances and avant-garde productions since 1998.

name: De Kunsthaven
description: Multifunctional cultural center in a converted warehouse, hosting exhibitions, performances, and workshops.

name: Blue Note Amsterdam
description: Intimate jazz venue featuring local and international artists in a classic club atmosphere.

name: Galerie Modern
description: Contemporary art gallery showcasing emerging Dutch artists and international exhibitions.

name: FilmHuis West
description: Small independent cinema specializing in documentary and world cinema screenings.

name: Podium Zuid
description: Versatile performance space hosting dance, theater, and music events in Amsterdam Zuid.

name: Lachpaleis
description: Premier comedy venue featuring stand-up performances and improv shows.

name: Boekencafé Pagina
description: Cultural hub combining a bookstore, cafe, and event space for literary readings and discussions.
